title: Stirb langsam - Ein guter Tag zum Sterben
description: Iconoclastic, take-no-prisoners cop John McClane, for the first time, finds himself on foreign soil after traveling to Moscow to help his wayward son Jack - unaware that Jack is really a highly-trained CIA operative out to stop a nuclear weapons heist. With the Russian underworld in pursuit, and battling a countdown to war, the two McClanes discover that their opposing methods make them unstoppable heroes. Written by Guy from Estonia
castList: [Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Yuliya Snigir, Radivoje Bukvic, Cole Hauser, Amaury Nolasco, Sergey Kolesnikov, Roman Luknár, Zolee Ganxsta, Péter Takátsy, Pasha D. Lychnikoff, Megalyn Echikunwoke, Melissa Tang]
characterList: [John McClane, Jack McClane, Komarov, Lucy, Irina (as Yulia Snigir), Alik (as Rasha Bukvic), Collins, Murphy, Chagarin, Anton, MRAP Driver (as Ganxsta Doglegy Zolee), Prosecutor, Cabbie, Pretty Reporter, Lucas]
